alert.note: Alert for Faulk; Hyde; Potter; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:27PM MDT until August 05 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sully County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Southwestern Faulk County in north central South Dakota... Southeastern Potter County in north central South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stone Lake, or 14 miles southeast of Gettysburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stone Lake around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Seneca. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
